AUTHOR: Yandols
INSTALL_MSG:
This cog allows to set the user as away. When someone mentions the users the bot replies with either its own message or a message set by the user that the user is away. 
**Disclaimer:** This cog is an edit of Paddo's away cog.
NAME: AwayEdited
SHORT: Sets the user as away with a custom message.
DESCRIPTION:
Sets the user as away. When someone mentions the users the bot replies with either its own message or a message set by the user that the user is away.
An edit of Paddo's away cog.
